Comments_List: I developed a deeper understanding of some specific topics in indonesian culture, while working together with the other students to put together a project we were very proud of. My language skills have gotten better every semester!
Yes! If you take Indonesian, you really need to do one of the higher level classes to get an idea of all of the different aspects of the country, and its really just a start on that topic.
